name: Ako v0.01
description:
This is where I'd put the game's description, IF IT HAD ONE!!!!!

Controls:

  • Move - ASDW
  • Jump - Space
  • Run - Shift
  • Release wave - Right Click
  • Fire pulse - Hold Right Click
  • Pull - Left Click
  • Fullscreen switching - Tab
  • Exit to Windows - Esc

Developer keys:

  • Clear all sound particles - Backspace
  • Change game_speed - (Keypad + / Keypad -)
  • Restart game - R
  • Load checkpoint - L

DISCLAIMER: Ako is very much NOT complete and what is there can't even be considered a demo!

Join my Discord server for Ako if you are interested the game's future: discord.gg/QJn6UD3
